title.rendered: Esther Bancel. FW 2023/2024 during Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Esther Bancel. Collection Autumn & Winter 2023/2024

French tailoring maison inspired by early 20th century men's suits and by curiosity cabinets.

esther bancel brings to the fore handmade creations and cares for the transmission of ancestral know-how through an exclusive collaboration with a "sartorial master" whose manufacturing workshop is located in Picardy.

Esther Bancel has always reflected on what, artistically, is most fragile in us and how we can poetise and sublimate it.

This reflection creates somewhat of a conflict in her creations, a clash between darkness and the sometimes-invisible poetry that surrounds it.

The designer also gave thought to how we should create and consume a garment.

More than a brand, it's a way of doing things that she wishes to develop, a movement that totally contradicts how the textile industry currently handles its business.

For the sake of eco-responsibility, the brand wants to create products that don't meet stock requirements and seasonality. Every three months, esther bancel launches a new line of creations with new fits.

All creations are made to order and then sent to the brand's workshops in France, with deliveries within three weeks.

About Esther Bancel.

Esther Bancel is a young French designer who is committed to responsible fashion. Her wish is to design collections that offer a response to the issue of overconsumption. Esther Bancel is from Lyon. Out of SupdeMod, she perfected her techniques and deepened her knowledge of the fashion environment she's loved since childhood. Esther decided to travel to Paris to join the upcycling brand Lord SM Paris. In 2015, still completing her studies, she set up a collaborative association with her partner, Morgan Bancel: the Fashion French Union. Esther and Morgan launched their first collection in 2018 online and developed wholesale in 2021.The brand is now available in France/Spain/Belgium/England/Germany/USA


Text and Photo: Press Esther Bancel.

Thanks: LYOR AMAR INTERNATIONAL @lyoramarinternational

More on: www.estherbancel.com @esther_bancel


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
